verbose_text: Such as, curcumin can induce the autophagy of lung adenocarcinoma via AMP activated protein kinase signaling pathway, and angiotensin-(1-7) inhibits the migration and invasion of A549 human lung adenocarcinoma cells via inactivation of the phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase/Akt and mitogen activated protein kinase signaling pathways.
evidence: inhibits the migration and invasion of A549 human lung adenocarcinoma cells via inactivation of the phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase/Akt and mitogen-activated protein kinase
